divs: sighting detailssaw abnormally large orange globe coming from north kanata heading north\west towards dunrobin. globe changed direction as if circling the city of ottawa in a clock wise direction. i am able to call to my neighbour who witnesses this as well. just as first globe starts to grow dime due to travelling away from my position, a second exact globe travels in the same manner. i am positioned on a dock out in the ottawa river so i am able to see a large portion of the sky. we both agree that this is abnormal and decide to observe for a longer period of time. within about 40 minutes one more orange globe follows the exact same path. flight is about the same height you would expect a small plane to travel at but no noise, no flashing lights and oddly smooth flight direction. we considered a drone purhaps. next evening i decide to sit out on the deck again and at aproximately 11 pm the same event happens again, just one globe. googled "ufo ottawa" and read a note about two people seeing orange globes over the city of ottawa and simply wanted to add my two cents. nothing else happened besides the viewing.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Woodlawn
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Orange globe shape, appeared to be circling city of Ottawa, two at same time
